trans-unit.target: 以字典形式返回给定变量的信息。这些信息包括它的名称、类型、提示和用途。

trans-unit.target: 返回给定节点的输入数量。不同类型的节点有不同的输入量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the input source for a given node input.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定节点输入的输入源。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer hash of the variable passed.
trans-unit.target: 返回所传递变量的整数哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integral value that is nearest to s, with halfway cases rounded away from zero.
trans-unit.target: 返回最接近 s 的整数值，中间情况从零舍入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the internal type of the given Variant object, using the TYPE_* enum in @GlobalScope.
trans-unit.target: 返回内部类型的给定变体的对象，利用在TYPE_ *枚举@GlobalScope。

trans-unit.source: Returns the interpolated color specified by offset
trans-unit.target: 返回由offset指定的插值颜色

trans-unit.source: Returns the interpolated value of a transform track at a given time (in seconds). An array consisting of 3 elements: position (Vector3), rotation (Quat) and scale (Vector3).
trans-unit.target: 返回给定时间（以秒为单位）的变换轨迹的插值。一个由3个元素组成的数组：位置（Vector3），旋转（Quat）和比例（Vector3）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the interpolation type of a given track, from the INTERPOLATION_* enum.
trans-unit.target: 从INTERPOLATION_*枚举中返回给定轨迹的插值类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection between two AABB. An empty AABB (size 0,0,0) is returned on failure.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个 AABB 之间的交集。失败时将返回一个空的ABB（大小为0,0,0）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of this Rect2 and b.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 Rect2 与b 的交集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection point of a ray consisting of the position “from” and the direction normal “dir” with this plane. If no intersection is found null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回由位置“ from”和方向“ dir”组成的射线与此平面的交点。如果找不到交集，则返回null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection point of a segment from position “begin” to position “end” with this plane. If no intersection is found null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回该平面从位置“ begin”到位置“ end”的线段的相交点。如果找不到交集，则返回null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection point of the three planes “b”, “c” and this plane. If no intersection is found null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回三个平面“ b”，“ c”与该平面的交点。如果找不到交集，则返回null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the inverse of the matrix.
trans-unit.target: 返回矩阵的倒数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the inverse of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 返回四元数的倒数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the inverse of the transform, under the assumption that the transformation is composed of rotation and translation (no scaling, use affine_inverse for transforms with scaling).
trans-unit.target: 返回变换的反值,假设变换由旋转和平移组成(没有缩放,对于有缩放的变换使用 affine_inverse)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the inverse of the transform, under the assumption that the transformation is composed of rotation, scaling and translation.
trans-unit.target: 返回变换的反值,前提是变换由旋转、缩放和平移组成。

trans-unit.source: Returns the inverse of the vector. This is the same as Vector3( 1.0 / v.x, 1.0 / v.y, 1.0 / v.z ).
trans-unit.target: 返回向量的逆。这与 Vector3( 1.0 / v.x, 1.0 / v.y, 1.0 / v.z ) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the inverted color (1 - r, 1 - g, 1 - b, a).
trans-unit.target: 返回反色 (1 - r, 1 - g, 1 - b, a) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the label used for built-in text.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于内置文本的标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element of the array if the array is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组不是空的,返回数组的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last error that happened when trying to perform operations. Compare with the ERR_FILE_* constants from Error.
trans-unit.target: 返回尝试执行操作时发生的最后一个错误。与Error中的 ERR_FILE_* 常量进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last pressed button’s index.
trans-unit.target: 返回最后按下的按钮的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last time the file was modified in unix timestamp format or returns a String “ERROR IN file”. This unix timestamp can be converted to datetime by using OS.get_datetime_from_unix_time.
trans-unit.target: 返回上次以unix时间戳格式修改 file 时间，或者返回字符串 “ ERROR IN file ”。可以使用OS.get_datetime_from_unix_time将这个unix时间戳转换为datetime 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the left TangentMode for the point at index.
trans-unit.target: 返回 index 处的点的左 TangentMode 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the left tangent angle (in degrees) for the point at index.
trans-unit.target: 返回 index 处的点的左切线角（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length in indices of the index array in the requested surface (see add_surface_from_arrays).
trans-unit.target: 返回所请求表面中索引数组的索引长度（请参见add_surface_from_arrays）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length in vertices of the vertex array in the requested surface (see add_surface_from_arrays).
trans-unit.target: 返回所请求曲面中顶点数组的顶点长度（请参见add_surface_from_arrays）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the audio stream in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 返回音频流的长度,单位为秒。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the quaternion, squared.
trans-unit.target: 返回四元数的长度,平方。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length of the quaternion.
trans-unit.target: 返回四元数的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the light occluder of the subtile from an atlas/autotile given its coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 从给定坐标的图集/自变量中返回子层的遮光板。

trans-unit.source: Returns the line the editing cursor is at.
trans-unit.target: 返回编辑光标所在的行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the linear interpolation with another color. The interpolation factor t is between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有另一种颜色的线性插值。插值因子 t 在0到1之间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the linear velocity vector at the collider’s contact point.
trans-unit.target: 返回对撞机接触点处的线速度矢量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of bound parameters for the signal at idx.
trans-unit.target: 返回 idx 处信号的绑定参数列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of colors in the presets of the color picker.
trans-unit.target: 返回颜色选择器预设中的颜色列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of extensions available for saving a resource of a given type.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用于保存给定类型资源的扩展名列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of extensions available for saving the resource object, provided it is recognized (see recognize).
trans-unit.target: 返回可用于保存资源对象的扩展名列表，前提是该资源对象被识别（请参见Recognize）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of group names associated with the node at idx.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 idx 处的节点关联的组名列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of items.
trans-unit.target: 返回项目列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of keys in the Dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Dictionary 中的键列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of recognized extensions for a resource type.
trans-unit.target: 返回资源类型的认可扩展列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of resources inside the preloader.
trans-unit.target: 返回预加载器中的资源列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of signals as an Array of dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 以字典数组形式返回信号列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of stored animation names.
trans-unit.target: 返回存储的动画名称列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of values in the Dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Dictionary 中的值列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the load stage. The total amount of stages can be queried with get_stage_count.
trans-unit.target: 返回加载阶段。可以使用get_stage_count查询阶段的总数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the loaded resource if the load operation completed successfully, null otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果加载操作成功完成，则返回加载的资源，否则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the local normal at the contact point.
trans-unit.target: 返回接触点的局部法线。

trans-unit.source: Returns the local position of the contact point.
trans-unit.target: 返回接触点的局部位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the local shape index of the collision.
trans-unit.target: 返回碰撞的局部形状指数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of the Camera2D’s screen-center, relative to the origin.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Camera2D 屏幕中心相对于原点的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the main container of Godot editor’s window. You can use it, for example, to retrieve the size of the container and place your controls accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 返回Godot编辑器窗口的主容器。例如，您可以使用它来检索容器的大小并相应地放置控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the main loop object (see MainLoop and SceneTree).
trans-unit.target: 返回主循环对象（请参见MainLoop和SceneTree）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the max amount of static memory used (only works in debug).
trans-unit.target: 返回静态内存的最大使用量(仅在调试时有效)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum contacts that can be reported. See body_set_max_contacts_reported.
trans-unit.target: 返回可以报告的最大联系人。参见body_set_max_contacts_reported。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum contacts that can be reported. See body_set_max_contacts_reported.
trans-unit.target: 返回可以报告的最大联系人。参见body_set_max_contacts_reported。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum of two values.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个值的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum value contained in the array if all elements are of comparable types. If the elements can’t be compared, null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有元素都是可比较类型，则返回数组中包含的最大值。如果无法比较元素，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mesh of the item.
trans-unit.target: 返回物品的网格。

trans-unit.source: Returns the metadata of a shape of a body.
trans-unit.target: 返回主体形状的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Returns the metadata of the specified item, which might be of any type. You can set it with set_item_metadata, which provides a simple way of assigning context data to items.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定项目的元数据，该元数据可以是任何类型。您可以使用set_item_metadata进行设置，这提供了一种将上下文数据分配给项目的简单方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the metadata value of the specified index set by set_item_metadata.
trans-unit.target: 返回由set_item_metadata设置的指定索引的元数据值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the method connected to the signal at idx.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 idx 处的信号连接的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the method name of a method track.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个方法轨迹的方法名。

trans-unit.source: Returns the minimum angle to the given vector.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定向量的最小角度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the minimum of two values.
trans-unit.target: 返回两个值的最小值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the minimum size for this control. See rect_min_size.
trans-unit.target: 返回此控件的最小大小。参见rect_min_size。

trans-unit.source: Returns the minimum size that this stylebox can be shrunk to.
trans-unit.target: 返回该样式框可以缩小的最小尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Returns the minimum value contained in the array if all elements are of comparable types. If the elements can’t be compared, null is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有元素均为可比较类型，则返回数组中包含的最小值。如果无法比较元素，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the model name of the current device.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前设备的型号名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the most contrasting color.
trans-unit.target: 返回对比度最高的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mouse cursor shape the control displays on mouse hover. See CursorShape.
trans-unit.target: 返回控件在鼠标悬停时显示的鼠标光标形状。参见CursorShape。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mouse mode. See the constants for more information.
trans-unit.target: 返回鼠标模式。更多信息请参见常量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mouse position relative to the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 返回鼠标相对于视口的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the mouse speed for the last time the cursor was moved, and this until the next frame where the mouse moves. This means that even if the mouse is not moving, this function will still return the value of the last motion.
trans-unit.target: 返回上次移动光标时的鼠标速度,一直到下一帧鼠标移动时的速度。这意味着即使鼠标没有移动,这个函数也会返回最后一次移动的数值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name given to this anchor.
trans-unit.target: 返回给这个锚的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of animation or empty string if not found.
trans-unit.target: 返回 animation 名称或空字符串（如果找不到）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the master_player’s Animation bound to this animation node.
trans-unit.target: 返回绑定到此动画节点的master_player的Animation的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the blend shape at this index.
trans-unit.target: 返回此索引处的混合形状的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the bone at index “index”.
trans-unit.target: 返回索引为“ index”的骨骼的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the bus that the bus at index bus_idx sends to.
trans-unit.target: 返回索引为 bus_idx 的总线发送到的总线的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the bus with the index bus_idx.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有索引 bus_idx 的总线的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the file at index idx.
trans-unit.target: 返回索引为 idx 的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the host OS. Possible values are: “Android”, “Haiku”, “iOS”, “HTML5”, “OSX”, “Server”, “Windows”, “UWP”, “X11”.
trans-unit.target: 返回主机操作系统的名称。可能的值为：“ Android”，“ Haiku”，“ iOS”，“ HTML5”，“ OSX”，“服务器”，“ Windows”，“ UWP”，“ X11”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the item.
trans-unit.target: 返回项目的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the joypad at the specified device index
trans-unit.target: 返回指定设备索引处的游戏板名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the next animation in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 返回队列中下一个动画的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the node at idx.
trans-unit.target: 返回 idx 处的节点名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the property at prop_idx for the node at idx.
trans-unit.target: 返回位于属性的名称 prop_idx 在节点 idx 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the signal at idx.
trans-unit.target: 返回 idx 处的信号名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the video driver matching the given driver index. This index is a value from VideoDriver, and you can use get_current_video_driver to get the current backend’s index.
trans-unit.target: 返回与给定 driver 索引匹配的视频驱动程序的名称。该索引是VideoDriver的值，您可以使用get_current_video_driver获取当前后端的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of this directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回此目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of this interface (OpenVR, OpenHMD, ARKit, etc).
trans-unit.target: 返回该接口的名称(OpenVR、OpenHMD、ARKit等)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of all the classes available.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有可用类的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of all the classes that directly or indirectly inherit from ‘class’.
trans-unit.target: 返回直接或间接继承自“ class”的所有类的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the navigation point closest to the given line segment. When enabling use_collision, only considers intersection points between segment and navigation meshes. If multiple intersection points are found, the one closest to the segment start point is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回最接近给定线段的导航点。启用 use_collision 时，仅考虑线段和导航网格之间的交点。如果找到多个交点，则返回最接近线段起点的那个交点。

trans-unit.source: Returns the navigation point closest to the point given. Points are in local coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 返回离给定点最近的导航点。点是在局部坐标空间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the navigation polygon of the subtile from an atlas/autotile given its coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 从给定坐标的地图集/autotile中返回子tile的导航多边形。

trans-unit.source: Returns the navigation polygon of the tile.
trans-unit.target: 返回瓦片的导航多边形。

trans-unit.source: Returns the nearest larger power of 2 for integer value.
trans-unit.target: 返回的2整数最接近的较大功率 value 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next 16 bits from the file as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 以整数形式返回文件中的下一个16位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next 32 bits from the file as a floating point number.
trans-unit.target: 从文件中返回下一个32位的浮点数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next 32 bits from the file as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 以整数形式返回文件中的下一个32位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next 64 bits from the file as a floating point number.
trans-unit.target: 从文件中返回下一个64位的浮点数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next 64 bits from the file as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 以整数形式返回文件中的下一个64位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next 8 bits from the file as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 以整数形式返回文件中的后8位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next Variant value from the file. When allow_objects is true decoding objects is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 返回文件中的下一个Variant值。当 allow_objects 为 true 时,允许解码对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next TreeItem in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 返回树中的下一个TreeItem。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next available point id with no point associated to it.
trans-unit.target: 返回下一个没有关联点的可用点ID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next bits from the file as a floating point number.
trans-unit.target: 将文件中的下一个位数以浮点数的形式返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next element (file or directory) in the current directory (including . and .., unless skip_navigational was given to list_dir_begin).
trans-unit.target: 返回当前目录中的下一个元素（文件或目录）（包括 . 和 .. ，除非将 skip_navigational 指定给list_dir_begin）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next line of the file as a String.
trans-unit.target: 以String形式返回文件的下一行。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next selected item after the given one.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定项目后的下一个选择项目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next value of the file in CSV (Comma Separated Values) format. You can pass a different delimiter to use other than the default “,” (comma), it should be one character long.
trans-unit.target: 以CSV（逗号分隔值）格式返回文件的下一个值。您可以传递其他定界符以使用默认的“，”（逗号）以外的字符，该定界符应为一个字符长。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next visible TreeItem in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 返回树中下一个可见的TreeItem。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node’s restTransform2D if it doesn’t have a parent, or its rest pose relative to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点没有父节点或相对于其父节点的其余姿势，则返回该节点的其余 Transform2D 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node’s Viewport.
trans-unit.target: 返回节点的Viewport。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node’s index as part of the entire skeleton. See Skeleton2D.
trans-unit.target: 返回节点的索引作为整个框架的一部分。参见Skeleton2D。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node’s index, i.e. its position among the siblings of its parent.
trans-unit.target: 返回节点的索引，即节点在其父级同级之间的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node’s index, which is its position relative to its siblings. This is only relevant and saved in scenes for cases where new nodes are added to an instanced or inherited scene among siblings from the base scene. Despite the name, this index is not related to the idx argument used here and in other methods.
trans-unit.target: 返回节点的索引，该索引是其相对于其同级的位置。仅在将新节点添加到基础场景的同级对象中的实例或继承场景中的情况下，这才有意义并保存在场景中。尽管有名称，但此索引与此处和其他方法中使用的 idx 参数无关。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node’s order in the scene tree branch. For example, if called on the first child node the position is 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回场景树分支中节点的顺序。例如，如果在第一个子节点上调用，则位置为 0 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the normal of the intersecting object’s shape at the collision point.
trans-unit.target: 返回相交对象形状在碰撞点处的法线。

trans-unit.source: Returns the normalized longest axis of the AABB.
trans-unit.target: 返回 AABB 的标准化最长轴。

trans-unit.source: Returns the normalized shortest axis of the AABB.
trans-unit.target: 返回 AABB 的归一化最短轴。

trans-unit.source: Returns the normalized vector pointing from this vector to b.
trans-unit.target: 返回从该向量指向 b 的归一化向量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of available buses.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用公共汽车的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bands of the equalizer.
trans-unit.target: 返回均衡器的段数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of blend shapes that the ArrayMesh holds.
trans-unit.target: 返回 ArrayMesh 保留的混合形状的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of buttons in column column. May be used to get the most recently added button’s index, if no index was specified.
trans-unit.target: 返回column column 的按钮数。如果未指定索引，则可用于获取最近添加的按钮的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of capturing groups in compiled pattern.
trans-unit.target: 返回编译模式中捕获组的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of capturing groups.
trans-unit.target: 返回捕获组的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 返回子节点的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of colors in the ramp
trans-unit.target: Returns the number of colors in the ramp.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of connections in the graph.

trans-unit.target: 返回此向量和 b 之间线性插值的结果，数量为 t 。 t 在 0.0 - 1.0 的范围内，表示插值量。

trans-unit.source: Scripts extending this class and implementing its _run() method can be executed from the Script Editor’s File -> Run menu option (or by pressing CTRL+Shift+X) while the editor is running. This is useful for adding custom in-editor functionality to Godot. For more complex additions, consider using EditorPlugins instead. Note that extending scripts need to have tool mode enabled.

trans-unit.source: Searches the text for the compiled pattern and replaces it with the specified string. Escapes and backreferences such as $1 and $name are expanded and resolved. By default only the first instance is replaced but it can be changed for all instances (global replacement). The region to search within can be specified without modifying where the start and end anchor would be.
trans-unit.target: 在文本中搜索已编译的模式，并将其替换为指定的字符串。转义符和后向引用（例如 $1 和 $name 被扩展和解析。默认情况下，仅第一个实例被替换，但是可以为所有实例更改（全局替换）。可以指定要搜索的区域，而无需修改开始和结束锚点的位置。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text for the compiled pattern. Returns a RegExMatch container of the first matching result if found, otherwise null. The region to search within can be specified without modifying where the start and end anchor would be.
trans-unit.target: 在文本中搜索已编译的模式。返回第一个匹配结果的RegExMatch容器（如果找到），否则返回null。可以指定要搜索的区域，而无需修改开始和结束锚点的位置。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text for the compiled pattern. Returns an array of RegExMatch containers for each non-overlapping result. If no results were found an empty array is returned instead. The region to search within can be specified without modifying where the start and end anchor would be.
trans-unit.target: 在文本中搜索已编译的模式。返回每个非重叠结果的RegExMatch容器数组。如果未找到结果，则返回一个空数组。可以指定要搜索的区域，而无需修改开始和结束锚点的位置。

trans-unit.source: Sends a rpc to a specific peer identified by peer_id using an unreliable protocol (see NetworkedMultiplayerPeer.set_target_peer). Returns an empty Variant.
trans-unit.target: 使用不可靠的协议将rpc发送到 peer_id 标识的特定对等方（请参见NetworkedMultiplayerPeer.set_target_peer）。返回一个空的Variant。

trans-unit.source: Sends a rpc using an unreliable protocol. Returns an empty Variant.
trans-unit.target: 使用不可靠的协议发送rpc。返回一个空的Variant。

trans-unit.source: Sends a raw request to the connected host. The URL parameter is just the part after the host, so for http://somehost.com/index.php, it is index.php.
trans-unit.target: 向连接的主机发送原始请求。 URL参数只是主机后面的一部分，因此对于 http://somehost.com/index.php ，它是 index.php 。

trans-unit.source: Sends a remote procedure call request for the given method to peers on the network (and locally), optionally sending all additional arguments as arguments to the method called by the RPC. The call request will only be received by nodes with the same NodePath, including the exact same node name. Behaviour depends on the RPC configuration for the given method, see rpc_config. Methods are not exposed to RPCs by default. Also see rset and rset_config for properties. Returns an empty Variant. Note that you can only safely use RPCs on clients after you received the connected_to_server signal from the SceneTree. You also need to keep track of the connection state, either by the SceneTree signals like server_disconnected or by checking SceneTree.network_peer.get_connection_status() == CONNECTION_CONNECTED.
trans-unit.target: 将给定 method 的远程过程调用请求发送到网络上（和本地）的对等方，可以选择将所有其他参数作为参数发送给RPC调用的方法。具有相同NodePath的节点（包括完全相同的节点名称）将仅接收该呼叫请求。行为取决于给定方法的RPC配置，请参阅rpc_config。默认情况下，方法不公开给RPC。有关属性，另请参见rset和rset_config。返回一个空的Variant。请注意，只有从SceneTree接收到 connected_to_server 信号后，才能在客户端上安全地使用RPC。。您还需要通过诸如 server_disconnected 之类的SceneTree信号或通过检查 SceneTree.network_peer.get_connection_status() == CONNECTION_CONNECTED 来跟踪连接状态。

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to the connected host. The URL parameter is just the part after the host, so for http://somehost.com/index.php, it is index.php.
trans-unit.target: 向连接的主机发送请求。URL参数只是主机后面的一部分，因此对于 http://somehost.com/index.php ，它是 index.php 。

trans-unit.source: Set a custom parameter. These are used as local storage, because resources can be reused across the tree or scenes.

trans-unit.source: Set a name for a given surface.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的曲面设置一个名称。

trans-unit.source: Set a variable’s info, using the same format as get_variable_info.
trans-unit.target: 使用与get_variable_info相同的格式设置变量的信息。

trans-unit.source: Set custom data for a specific instance. Although Color is used, it is just a container for 4 numbers.
trans-unit.target: 为特定实例设置自定义数据。尽管使用了颜色，但它只是4个数字的容器。

trans-unit.source: Set dialog to open or save mode, changes selection behavior. See enum Mode constants.
trans-unit.target: 将对话框设置为打开或保存模式，更改选择行为。请参见枚举 Mode 常量。

trans-unit.source: Set file type filters. This example shows only .png and .gd files set_filters(PoolStringArray(["*.png ; PNG Images","*.gd ; GD Script"])).
trans-unit.target: 设置文件类型过滤器。此示例仅显示.png和.gd文件 set_filters(PoolStringArray(["*.png ; PNG Images","*.gd ; GD Script"])) 。png ; PNG图片”，“ *。gd; GD脚本”]）））。

trans-unit.source: Set the Image of this ImageTexture.
trans-unit.target: 设置此 ImageTexture 的图像。

trans-unit.source: Set the Shape2D that will be used for collision/intersection queries.
trans-unit.target: 设置将用于碰撞/相交查询的Shape2D。

trans-unit.source: Set the ID of an item at index “idx”.
trans-unit.target: 在索引“ idx”处设置项目的ID。

trans-unit.source: Set the accelerator of the item at index “idx”. Accelerators are special combinations of keys that activate the item, no matter which control is focused.
trans-unit.target: 将项目的加速器设置为索引“ idx”。加速器是激活项目的按键的特殊组合，无论聚焦哪个控件。

trans-unit.source: Set the base type of the script.
trans-unit.target: 设置脚本的基本类型。

trans-unit.source: Set the bone index “parent_idx” as the parent of the bone at “bone_idx”. If -1, then bone has no parent. Note: “parent_idx” must be less than “bone_idx”.
trans-unit.target: 将骨骼索引“ parent_idx”设置为“ bone_idx”处的骨骼的父代。如果为-1，则骨骼没有父对象。注意：“ parent_idx”必须小于“ bone_idx”。

trans-unit.source: Set the camera’s position immediately to its current smoothing destination.
trans-unit.target: 立即将相机的位置设置为其当前的平滑目的地。

trans-unit.source: Set the checkstate status of the item at index “idx”.
trans-unit.target: 在索引“ idx”处设置项目的检查状态。

trans-unit.source: Set the color of a specific instance.
trans-unit.target: 设置特定实例的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Set the default channel to be used to transfer data. By default this value is -1 which means that ENet will only use 2 channels, one for reliable and one for unreliable packets. Channel 0 is reserved, and cannot be used. Setting this member to any value between 0 and channel_count (excluded) will force ENet to use that channel for sending data.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于传输数据的默认通道。默认情况下，此值为 -1 ，这意味着ENet仅使用2个通道，一个用于可靠通道，一个用于不可靠数据包。通道 0 被保留，不能使用。将此成员设置为 0 到channel_count之间的任何值（不包括在内）将强制ENet使用该通道发送数据。

trans-unit.source: Set the destination address and port for sending packets and variables, a hostname will be resolved using if valid.
trans-unit.target: 设置发送数据包和变量的目的地址和端口,如果有效,将使用主机名进行解析。

trans-unit.source: Set the direction of the occlusion culling or disable it. Default value: CULL_DISABLED.
trans-unit.target: 设置遮挡剔除的方向或将其禁用。默认值：CULL_DISABLED。

trans-unit.source: Set the faces (an array of triangles).
trans-unit.target: 设置面(一个三角形数组)。

trans-unit.source: Set the given track as imported or not.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定的轨道是否导入。

trans-unit.source: Set the icon of an item at index “idx”.
trans-unit.target: 将项目的图标设置在索引“ idx”处。

trans-unit.source: Set the id of the item at index “idx”.
trans-unit.target: 在索引“ idx”处设置项目的ID。

trans-unit.source: Set the interpolation type of a given track, from the INTERPOLATION_* enum.
trans-unit.target: 从INTERPOLATION_*枚举中设置给定轨迹的插值类型。

trans-unit.source: Set the list of favorite files and directories for this project.
trans-unit.target: 设置本项目最喜欢的文件和目录列表。

trans-unit.source: Set the list of recently visited folders in the file dialog for this project.
trans-unit.target: 在本项目的文件对话框中设置最近访问的文件夹列表。

trans-unit.source: Set the main window height. On desktop, this is the default window size. Stretch mode settings use this also as a reference when enabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置主窗口高度。在桌面上,这是默认的窗口大小。启用拉伸模式后,拉伸模式设置也将此作为参考。

trans-unit.source: Set the mesh index for the cell referenced by its grid-based X, Y and Z coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 设置以网格为基础的 X、Y、Z 坐标为参照的单元格的网格指数。

trans-unit.source: Set the mesh of the item.
trans-unit.target: 设置项目的网格。

trans-unit.source: Set the mouse mode. See the constants for more information.
trans-unit.target: 设置鼠标模式。更多信息请参见常量。

trans-unit.source: Set the name of the item.
trans-unit.target: 设置项目的名称。

trans-unit.source: Set the path of a track. Paths must be valid scene-tree paths to a node, and must be specified starting from the parent node of the node that will reproduce the animation. Tracks that control properties or bones must append their name after the path, separated by “:”.
trans-unit.target: 设置轨道的路径。路径必须是到节点的有效场景树路径，并且必须从将重现动画的节点的父节点开始指定。控制属性或骨骼的轨道必须在路径后添加名称，以“：”分隔。

trans-unit.source: Set the quaternion to a rotation specified by Euler angles (in the YXZ convention: first Z, then X, and Y last), given in the vector format as (X-angle, Y-angle, Z-angle).
trans-unit.target: 将四元组设置为由欧拉角指定的旋转(在YXZ的约定中:先Z,再X,最后Y),向量格式为(X-角,Y-角,Z-角)。

trans-unit.source: Set the quaternion to a rotation which rotates around axis by the specified angle, in radians. The axis must be a normalized vector.
trans-unit.target: 设置四元数为绕轴旋转指定角度的旋转,单位为弧度。轴必须是归一化的向量。

trans-unit.source: Set the rest transform for bone “bone_idx”
trans-unit.target: 设置骨骼“ bone_idx”的其余变换

trans-unit.source: Set the size of the array. If the array is grown reserve elements at the end of the array. If the array is shrunk truncate the array to the new size.
trans-unit.target: 设置数组的大小。如果数组长大,则在数组的最后保留元素。如果数组被缩小,则截断数组到新的大小。

trans-unit.source: Set the text of an item at index “idx”.
trans-unit.target: 将项目的文本设置在索引“ idx”处。

trans-unit.source: Set the text of the item at index “idx”.
trans-unit.target: 将项目的文本设置在索引“ idx”处。

trans-unit.source: Set the title of a column.
trans-unit.target: 设置列的标题。

trans-unit.source: Set the transform for a specific instance.
trans-unit.target: 设置特定实例的变换。

trans-unit.source: Set the transition curve (easing) for a specific key (see built-in math function “ease”).
trans-unit.target: 设置特定键的过渡曲线（缓和）（请参见内置数学函数“ ease”）。

trans-unit.source: Set the update mode (UPDATE_*) of a value track.
trans-unit.target: 设置值轨的更新模式(UPDATE_*)。

trans-unit.source: Set the value of an existing key.
trans-unit.target: 设置现有钥匙的值。

trans-unit.source: Set the window to full screen when it starts.
trans-unit.target: 窗口启动时设置为全屏。

trans-unit.source: Set whether the node ignores notification that its transformation (global or local) changed.
trans-unit.target: 设置节点是否忽略其变换(全局或局部)改变的通知。

trans-unit.source: Set whether the node notifies about its global and local transformation changes. Spatial will not propagate this by default.
trans-unit.target: 设置节点是否通知其全局和局部转换更改。在默认情况下， Spatial 不会传播此信息。

trans-unit.source: Set whether the node notifies about its local transformation changes. Spatial will not propagate this by default.
trans-unit.target: 设置节点是否通知其本地转换更改。在默认情况下， Spatial 不会传播此信息。

trans-unit.source: Set/clear individual bits on the collision mask. This makes selecting the areas scanned easier.
trans-unit.target: 设置/清除碰撞掩模上的各个位。这使得选择扫描的区域更加容易。

trans-unit.source: Set/clear individual bits on the collision mask. This simplifies editing which Area layers this Area scans.
trans-unit.target: 设置/清除冲突掩码上的各个位。这简化了该 Area 扫描哪些 Area 层的编辑。

trans-unit.source: Set/clear individual bits on the layer mask. This makes getting an area in/out of only one layer easier.
trans-unit.target: 设置/清除图层蒙版上的各个位。这使得只进入/离开一个图层的区域变得更容易。

trans-unit.source: Set/clear individual bits on the layer mask. This simplifies editing this Area’s layers.
trans-unit.target: 设置/清除层掩码上的各个位。这样可以简化对该 Area 的图层的编辑。

trans-unit.source: Sets ‘property’ value of ‘class’ to ‘value’.
trans-unit.target: 将“类”的“属性”值设置为“值”。

trans-unit.source: Sets margin_left and margin_top at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 同时设置margin_left和margin_top。

trans-unit.source: Sets margin_right and margin_bottom at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 同时设置margin_right和margin_bottom。

trans-unit.source: Sets CanvasItem to be drawn behind its parent.
trans-unit.target: 将CanvasItem设置为在其父级后面绘制。

trans-unit.source: Sets Material to be used by the Mesh you are constructing.
trans-unit.target: 设置要构造的网格物体要使用的材质。

trans-unit.source: Sets Theme’s Color to color at name in type.
trans-unit.target: 设置主题的颜色，以 color 在 name 中 type 。

trans-unit.source: Sets Theme’s Font to font at name in type.
trans-unit.target: 集主题的字体到 font 的 name 的 type 。

trans-unit.source: Sets Theme’s StyleBox to stylebox at name in type.
trans-unit.target: 设置主题的StyleBox到 stylebox 在 name 中的 type 。

trans-unit.source: Sets Theme’s constant to constant at name in type.
trans-unit.target: 设置主题的恒定 constant 的 name 在 type 。

trans-unit.source: Sets Theme’s icon Texture to texture at name in type.
trans-unit.target: 集主题的图标纹理来 texture 在 name 中 type 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a ShortCut for the specified item idx.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的项目 idx 设置ShortCut。

trans-unit.source: Sets a Transform2D on a tile’s shape.
trans-unit.target: 在图块的形状上设置Transform2D。

trans-unit.source: Sets a body parameter. A list of available parameters is on the BODY_PARAM_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个主体参数。可用的参数列表在BODY_PARAM_*常量中。

trans-unit.source: Sets a body parameter. See BodyParameter for a list of available parameters.
trans-unit.target: 设置主体参数。有关可用参数的列表，请参见BodyParameter。

trans-unit.source: Sets a body state (see BODY_STATE* constants).
trans-unit.target: 设置主体状态(参见 BODY_STATE*常量)。

trans-unit.source: Sets a body state using one of the BodyState constants.
trans-unit.target: 使用BodyState常量之一设置身体状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets a boot image. The color defines the background color and if scale is true the image will be scaled to fit the screen size.
trans-unit.target: 设置启动映像。颜色定义背景颜色，如果比例尺为 true ，则将缩放图像以适合屏幕尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Sets a canvas light’s energy.
trans-unit.target: 设置画布灯的能量。

trans-unit.source: Sets a cone_twist_joint parameter (see CONE_TWIST_JOINT* constants).
trans-unit.target: 设置圆锥体扭转接头参数(参见 CONE_TWIST_JOINT*常量)。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom mouse cursor image, which is only visible inside the game window. The hotspot can also be specified. Passing null to the image parameter resets to the system cursor. See enum CURSOR_* for the list of shapes.
trans-unit.target: 设置自定义鼠标光标图像，该图像仅在游戏窗口内可见。也可以指定热点。将 null 传递给image参数将重置为系统光标。有关形状的列表，请参见枚举 CURSOR_* 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom transform for drawing via components. Anything drawn afterwards will be transformed by this.
trans-unit.target: 设置通过组件进行绘图的自定义变换。之后绘制的任何东西都将被转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom transform for drawing via matrix. Anything drawn afterwards will be transformed by this.
trans-unit.target: 设置通过矩阵绘制时的自定义变换。之后绘制的任何东西都将被转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets a damped spring joint parameter. See DampedStringParam for a list of available parameters.
trans-unit.target: 设置阻尼弹簧接头参数。有关可用参数的列表，请参见DampedStringParam。

trans-unit.source: Sets a generic_6_DOF_joint flag (see G6DOF_JOINT_FLAG* constants).
trans-unit.target: 设置generic_6_DOF_joint标志(参见G6DOF_JOINT_FLAG*常量)。

trans-unit.target: 设置铰链_关节参数(参见HINGE_JOINT*常量,不含HINGE_JOINT_FLAG*)。

trans-unit.source: Sets a joint parameter. See JointParam for a list of available parameters.
trans-unit.target: 设置关节参数。有关可用参数的列表，请参见JointParam。

trans-unit.target: 设置瓷砖的遮光板。

trans-unit.source: Sets a title for the tab at index tab_idx. Tab titles default to the name of the indexed child node, but this can be overridden with set_tab_title.
trans-unit.target: 在索引 tab_idx 处为选项卡设置标题。选项卡标题默认为已索引子节点的名称，但是可以用set_tab_title覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Sets a value (of any type) to be stored with the item associated with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 设置与指定索引相关联的项目存储的值(任意类型)。

trans-unit.source: Sets a viewport’s camera.
trans-unit.target: 设置视口的相机。

trans-unit.target: 设置视口的画布。

trans-unit.source: Sets a viewport’s scenario.

trans-unit.source: Sets an Image for a side of the CubeMap using one of the SIDE_* constants or an integer 0-5.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SIDE_* 常量之一或0-5整数为 CubeMap 的一侧设置图像。

trans-unit.source: Sets an additional delay (in seconds) between this frame and the next one, that will be added to the time interval defined by fps. By default, frames have no delay defined. If a delay value is defined, the final time interval between this frame and the next will be 1.0 / fps + delay.
trans-unit.target: 设置此帧与下一帧之间的附加延迟（以秒为单位），该延迟将添加到fps定义的时间间隔中。默认情况下，没有定义延迟。如果定义了延迟值，则此帧与下一帧之间的最终时间间隔将是 1.0 / fps + delay 。

trans-unit.source: Sets an axis velocity. The velocity in the given vector axis will be set as the given vector length. This is useful for jumping behavior.

trans-unit.target: 设置碰撞掩码上的各个位。如果只需要更改一层的值，请使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Sets individual bits on the layer mask. Use this if you only need to change one layer’s value.
trans-unit.target: 设置图层掩码上的各个位。如果只需要更改一层的值，请使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Sets margin size, where black bars (or images, if black_bars_set_images was used) are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 设置页边距大小，在此处渲染黑条（或图像，如果使用了black_bars_set_images）。

trans-unit.source: Sets metadata of a shape within a body. This metadata is different from Object.set_meta, and can be retrieved on shape queries.
trans-unit.target: 设置体内形状的元数据。此元数据不同于Object.set_meta，并且可以在形状查询中进行检索。

trans-unit.source: Sets mix amount of a Mix node given its name and value.
trans-unit.target: 设置混合节点的混合量,给定其名称和值。

trans-unit.source: Sets object pickable with rays.
trans-unit.target: 设置对象可以用射线拾取。

trans-unit.source: Sets position of IME suggestion list popup (in window coordinates).
trans-unit.target: 设置IME建议列表弹出窗口的位置(以窗口坐标为准)。

trans-unit.source: Sets position of a node in the graph given its name and position.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个节点在图中的位置,给定其名称和位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets position of the joint in the local space of body a of the joint.
trans-unit.target: 设置关节在关节主体a的局部空间的位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets position of the joint in the local space of body b of the joint.
trans-unit.target: 设置关节在关节体b的局部空间的位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets seed for the random number generator.
trans-unit.target: 设置随机数发生器的种子。

trans-unit.source: Sets text of the item associated with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 设置与指定索引相关联的项目的文字。

trans-unit.source: Sets the BitmaskMode of the autotile.
trans-unit.target: 设置自动像素的BitmaskMode。

trans-unit.source: Sets the CanvasItem to copy a rect to the backbuffer.
trans-unit.target: 设置CanvasItem以将rect复制到后缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Sets the CanvasItem’s Transform2D.
trans-unit.target: 设置CanvasItem的Transform2D。

trans-unit.source: Sets the CanvasItem’s z-index, i.e. its draw order (lower indexes are drawn first).
trans-unit.target: 设置CanvasItem的z索引，即其绘制顺序（首先绘制较低的索引）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Color of the pixel at (x, y) if the image is locked. Example:
trans-unit.target: 如果图像被锁定，则将像素的颜色设置为 (x, y) 。例：

trans-unit.source: Sets the Material for a surface of the Mesh resource.
trans-unit.target: 为网格资源的表面设置材质。

trans-unit.source: Sets the String tooltip of the item at the specified index idx.
trans-unit.target: 将项目的String工具提示设置为指定的索引 idx 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Texture of the piece with index “idx” to “texture”.
trans-unit.target: 套纹理片索引“IDX”到“质感”的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Transform of the given shape owner.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定形状所有者的Transform。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Transform2D of the given shape owner.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定形状所有者的Transform2D。

trans-unit.source: Sets the weight_scale for the point with the given id.
trans-unit.target: 为具有给定ID的点设置 weight_scale 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the UV of given vertex.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定顶点的UV。

trans-unit.source: Sets the UV2 of given vertex.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定顶点的UV2。

trans-unit.source: Sets the absolute maximum of the soundlevel, in dB.
trans-unit.target: 设置声级的绝对最大值,单位为dB。

trans-unit.source: Sets the active tab’s visible property to the value true. Sets all other children’s to false.
trans-unit.target: 将活动选项卡的 visible 属性设置为 true 。将所有其他孩子的设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the anti-aliasing mode. see ViewportMSAA for options.
trans-unit.target: 设置抗锯齿模式。有关选项，请参见ViewportMSAA。

trans-unit.source: Sets the background color of the item specified by idx index to the specified Color.
trans-unit.target: 将 idx index 指定的项目的背景色设置为指定的Color。

trans-unit.source: Sets the base of the VisualInstance, which changes how the engine handles the VisualInstance under the hood.
trans-unit.target: 设置VisualInstance的基础,它改变了引擎在引擎下处理VisualInstance的方式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the base root node to use for RPCs. Instead of an absolute path, a relative path will be used to find the node upon which the RPC should be executed.
trans-unit.target: 设置RPC要使用的基本根节点。将使用相对路径代替绝对路径来寻找RPC应该执行的节点。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bit index passed to the value passed. Note that bit indexes range from 0-19.
trans-unit.target: 将传递的位索引设置为传递的 value 。请注意，位索引的范围是0-19。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bitmap’s element at the specified position, to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 将位图的元素在指定位置设置为指定值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bitmask of the subtile from an autotile given its coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 从给定坐标的自变量中设置子变量的位掩码。

trans-unit.source: Sets the blend amount of a Blend2 node given its name and value.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定Blend2节点的名称和值的混合量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the blend amount of a Blend3 node given its name and value.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定Blend3节点的名称和值的混合量。

trans-unit.source: Sets the blend amount of a Blend4 node given its name and value.
trans-unit.target: 设置Blend4节点的混合量,给定其名称和值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the body mode using one of the BodyMode constants.
trans-unit.target: 使用BodyMode常量之一设置身体模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the body mode, from one of the constants BODY_MODE*.
trans-unit.target: 从常量 BODY_MODE*中设置主体模式。
